import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './Booking.css'; const apiuser = 'http://localhost:9999/user' const apiBooking = "http://localhost:9999/booking" const apislectroom = "http://localhost:9999/selectroom" export default class Booking extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.onSubmitBooking = this.onSubmitBooking.bind(this) this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); //this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.state= { id: "", create_from : "", create_to : "", room_id: "" } } componentWillMount(){ const config = { headers: { Authorization : localStorage.getItem('token') } } console.log(localStorage.getItem('token')) // api axios นำ email มาแสดง axios.get(apiuser,config) .then( res => { console.log(res) // เซต Email มาแสดง this.setState({ id: res.data[0].id }) }, err => { console.log(err) } ) } handleChange(e) { this.setState({room_id: e.target.value}); } handleRoom(){ axios.get(apislectroom) .then(res => { console.log(res) this.setState({ room_id : res.data[0].r }) }, err => console.log(err) ) } onSubmitBooking(e){ e.preventDefault(); const configBooking = { headers: { Authorization : localStorage.getItem('token'), 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } } const data = { user_id : this.state.id, room_id : this.state.room_id, create_from : this.create_from, create_to : this.create_to, } console.log(data) console.log(JSON.stringify(data)) axios.post(apiBooking,data,configBooking) .then( res => { console.log(res.data) }, err => { console.log("Error",err) } ) } render() { console.log("render Booking id: ", this.state.id) console.log("render room id: ", this.state.room_id) return (
this.setState({ user_id: e.target.value })} /> this.create_from = e.target.value} />
this.create_to = e.target.value} />
{/* this.room_id= e.target.value} /> */} this.setState({room_id: e.target.value})} />
